name: Cuty - Pinkbows (Alpha)
description:
CONTROLS:

It is recommended the use of a gamepad to improve the game experience. However, the game can also be played using your pc keyboard.

INSTALLING INSTRUCTIONS:

1) Download the .exe file

2) Launch the file  (no installation is needed!)

LANGUAGES SUPPORTED:

The game supports both English and Italian.

NOTES:

All the programming,  graphic and audio assets are made by me. The game is still in development so there might be some bugs here and there. If you find one, please tell me.
